adHeader: Seasoned Graphic Designer / Art Director available
adDetails: I am a California based art director and graphic designer who has worked with clients from a wide array of industries; retail and fashion, publishing and media, bio-tech, politics, restaurants and a variety of small businesses. I have worked for many nationally and internationally known brands; concepting, directing, designing and executing a broad range of multi-channel projects including brand identity, environmental graphics and store signage, print collateral of all types, web design and e-commerce, editorial and packaging design. I have used his experience, talent and many resources to drive both fledgling and established brands to their creative best, while implementing best practices for efficiency, brand cohesion and fiscal responsibility. I'm looking for contract projects in the SF Bay area, email for portfolio and more information.
